  • Uses of ScoringStrategy in com.jeopardy.service

    Classes in com.jeopardy.service that implement ScoringStrategy
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    StandardScoringStrategy
    Default Jeopardy-style scoring strategy: Correct answer → +value Incorrect answer → -value This strategy is used by default in ScoreManager.
    Methods in com.jeopardy.service that return ScoringStrategy
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ScoringStrategy
    ScoreManager.getScoringStrategy()
    Returns the currently active scoring strategy.

    Description
    void

    Sets the scoring strategy used to compute score changes.
